verse.name: v1
verse.lines: From this valley they say you are leaving We will miss your bright swords and strong arms For they say you are taking as plunder All the food we have stored in our barns

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh leave us some things for the winter Take not all we implore with a sob Or when you return in the springtime You will not find a peasant to rob

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You have gotten our dear daughters pregnant You have cut up our cows for your stew Oh we hired you for our protection But we needed protection from you
